Source Ultimate Equipment pg. 22, PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 142, PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 143

[PFS] Statistics

Cost 1 gp Weight 1 lb.

Category Ammunition; Proficiency Ammunition

Description

A crossbow bolt used as a melee weapon is treated as a light improvised weapon (-4 penalty on attack rolls) and deals damage as a dagger of its size (critical multiplier x2). Bolts come in a case or quiver that holds 10 bolts. All crossbows except repeating crossbows use these kinds of crossbow bolts, which are sometimes called "quarrels."
